name: Vector switch
description:
VECTOR SWITCH - submission to NOKIA 3310 JAM 4.
It is a puzzle game of 10 levels where you need to send vectors towards lamps so that they are all switched on simultaneously. Timing matters as vectors continue their travel from the opposite side after leaving the screen and can switch off those lamps already lit.


CONTROLS

■ select vector - E
■ move vector - WASD
■ send vector - SPACE
■ level reload - R


RECENT CHANGES

■ music/sfx volume lowered
■ few more melodies added to the music stream


CREDITS

■ all graphics, code, music & sounds by IDLE BUM


Enjoy playing!
